name: Dark Sight
text: With further modification, your eyes can pierce the gloom of even magical darkness.
benefit: You gain the ability to see up to 15 feet clearly in magical darkness, such as that created by the deeper darkness spell.
text_zh: 通过进一步的增强，你的双眼甚至能够看透一定距离的魔法黑暗。
benefit_zh: 你获得能够看透15尺范围内魔法黑暗的能力，比如‘深幽黑暗术’造成的黑暗。
